get_my_phonon_params()[source]¶

Get phonon parameters from [‘program_keys’][‘mast_phonon_settings’][‘phonon_center_site’] and [‘program_keys’][‘mast_phonon_settings’][‘phonon_center_radius’] Returns:

[phonon_center_site, phonon_center_radius]
get_parent_image_structures()[source]¶

A low-mesh NEB may have written files named ‘parent_structure_<N-N>_0N’. For VASP these are CONTCAR-type files. Returns:

list of <Structure>: list of pymatgen Structure objects
get_parent_structures()[source]¶

Assume that parents have written files named ‘parent_structure_<N>’. For VASP these are CONTCAR-type files. Returns:

[struct_init, struct_fin]: pymatgen Structure objects
no_setup()[source]¶

No setup is needed.

place_parent_energy_files()[source]¶

Assume parents have written files parent_energy_<N>. Copy these files into the 00 and 0N directories.

write_neb()[source]¶

Get the parent structures, sort and match atoms, and interpolate. Write images to the appropriate folders.

write_neb_subfolders()[source]¶

Write the static runs to each subfolder.

write_phonon_multiple()[source]¶

Write the multiple phonon files, one for each atom and each direction.

write_phonon_single()[source]¶

Write the phonon files to a directory.
